name: JuggleBall (Arc676)
description:
This game was created for Weekly Game Jam, Week 18: Don't Drop It.

The paddle follows the cursor. When a ball hits the paddle, it gets launched up. The higher up your cursor, the higher the ball will bounce. You get points each time you catch a ball; longer airtimes get more points.

Power-ups spawn randomly and are activated on contact with any ball.

If you drop all the balls or drop a total of 20 balls, you lose.

Project available on GitHub under GPLv3.
